mapper.select: SELECT A.SVLF_NO, A.SVLF_BGNG_DT, A.SVLF_DDLB_DT, A.SVLF_NM, A.SVLF_CN, A.SVLF_DT, A.EMP_NO, A.LECTURE_ROOM_CD FROM TB_SVLF A WHERE A.SVLF_BGNG_DT <= #{dateInfo} AND A.SVLF_DDLB_DT >= #{dateInfo} ORDER BY A.SVLF_BGNG_DT ASC

SELECT C.ATTD_DT , C.STU_NO , A.USER_NM , C.ATTD_ABMI_YMD , C.ATTD_LEAVE_YMD , C.ATTD_CD , D.CD_NM FROM TB_STU A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVLF B ON A.SVLF_NO = B.SVLF_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ATTD C ON A.STU_NO = C.STU_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM_CD D ON D.CD_TYPE_ID = SUBSTR(C.ATTD_CD, 1, INSTR(C.ATTD_CD, '-') - 1) AND D.CD_VL = SUBSTR(C.ATTD_CD, INSTR(C.ATTD_CD, '-') + 1) WHERE A.SVLF_NO = #{svlfNo} AND C.ATTD_DT = #{attdDt} ORDER BY A.USER_NM ASC
